articles.title: NASA's Mars helicopter Ingenuity took its first aerial colour photos of the Red Planet's surface - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Ingenuity's three color photos, taken while in flight, show the tracks of the Perseverance Mars rover on the surface of the planet.

articles.title: T. rexes liked to walk as slowly as humans do, a leisurely 5kph, a new study says - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Experts already knew T. rex was slow, with a max speed between 10 and 25 mph. But a new study suggests these predators preferred to walk even slower.
articles.content:
For all the awe Tyrannosaurus rex inspires, the "king of the dinosaurs" wasn't very speedy.
